p: The hydrodistillation of the fresh leaves of A. polystachya gave light yellow oil with a yield of 1.21% ( v/ w). The essential oil of A. polystachya fresh leaves is composed mainly by oxygenated monoterpenes (93.61%), followed by hydrocarbon monoterpenes (4.10%) and hydrocarbon sesquiterpenes (1.28%) ( Table 1). Eight compounds were identified in the essential oil of A. polystachya, which corresponded to 98.99% of the total oil analyzed, and the main components were: R-carvone (91.03%), R-limonene (4.10%), and dihydrocarvone (1.07%) ( Figure 1).
